desc: Sleep better with a hoverquilt from Aeronaut Outdoor Gear! A premium light goose down quilt that fits 2 people . Get your best night's sleep in the great outdoors or wherever your adventures lead. Great for rooftop camping, campers, RVs, tents, chilling...you get it. This overstuffed quilt w/ goose down is comfortable

layout.text: The ultra warm goose down quilt for your adventures
